Title: Requires training for teachers, administrators and instructors in the area of mental health first aid
Summary: Requires training for teachers, administrators and instructors in the area of mental health first aid; requires office of mental health to assist in development of curriculum for training.
LawCode: Amd ยง3004, Ed L; amd ยง7.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring training for teachers, administrators and instructors in the area of mental health first aid
